channel.title: Just need a lil help(smarts of 2/10)
channel.description:
if possible, how do i change max hit, with str range and mage so i can make to the point where each lvl you gain, u actually hit a noticable amount higher
72 str, hitting 5s with rune scim >< 90 range, hitting 11s with c bow ><

item.title: Just need a lil help(smarts of 2/10)
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

hitDiff describes the amount of damage you hit.

There is a 2 other methods one called
CalculateMaxHit();
CalculateRange();
Both of them set your playerMaxHit variable to some number

than under one of those you see

hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);

which picks out a random number highest number picked would be playerMaxHit which one of those methods above just set for you.

Many ways to increase damage best would be to fix your
void CalculateMaxHit()
void CalculateRange()

just add some math inside each method that will increase the playerMaxHit in the final result.

Read full topic
item.source: Just need a lil help(smarts of 2/10)
